        Parameters:
        lr1 - start locationgRegion.
        lr2 - destination locationRegion.
        Returns:
        a new RoutingInfo. To get all output GeoNode, use getPath() method.

        Returns:

        Returns:
        scale value.

        lat1 - start location's latitude.

      • loadCloudBuilding

        public void loadCloudBuilding(java.lang.String token,
                     java.lang.String buildingId,
                     SAILS.OnFinishCallback onFinishCallback)
        Load building project from cloud.
        Parameters:
        token - developer's token. (To get the token, you should get SAILS developer identity on our cloud.)
        buildingId - building id (can get building id on our cloud)
        onFinishCallback - is called when procedure is completed. OnSuccess(String response) : load cloud building successfully OnFailed(String response) : load building failed, see the response for detailed information.
